name: [English] The Camp - Caravan Edition (C64)
description:
In the Year 2015, "The Camp" was released in the Forum64 Adventure adventure game compo - however only in German.

The Camp - Caravan Edition is an improved and translated version of the game, with revised graphics, more riddles to solve and - highly important - more peppermint tea.

The Camp is a text adventure satire that was made with the D42-Adventure System that is available from the Protovision shop. It bases on a real life youth camp, so similarities to existing persons or places are not totally coincidental.

Please also have a look at our product page if you want additional information.
